tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PestInfestationTracking (
  infestation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  area_id INT,
  pest_type VARCHAR(255),
  date_detected DATE,
  treatment_type VARCHAR(255),
  date_treated DATE
)

CREATE TABLE treatment_records (
  treatment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  infestation_id INT,
  treatment_date DATE,
  treatment_description TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (infestation_id) REFERENCES pest_infestations(infestation_id)
);

CREATE TABLE infestation_history (
  history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  pest_id INT,
  area_id INT,
  treatment_id INT,
  infestation_date DATE
);
